content:
Melva and I are getting a whole swack of errors of this sort when trying to run a FHIR core build:
ERROR @ fhir:ValueSet[languages].compose.include[1]: The code 'ar' is not valid in the system urn:ietf:bcp:47 (2)
terminology server was down. it's back up now
Jean Duteau has marked this topic as resolved.
